Article Title: “I get overwhelmed”: Justin Herbert’s girlfriend Madison Beer opens up about how public pressure affected her
Article Text:
Madison Beer opens up about stepping back.(Image via Backgrid)

Madison Beer opens up about how her relationship with fans has changed amid her new romance with Justin Herbert



Madison Beer seems to be enjoying her new life with Justin Herbert

The Los Angeles Chargers’ quarterback, Justin Herbert , has been focusing on the new season while he is turning heads with his new romance with the popular pop star, Madison Beer. Though Justin Herbert and Madison Beer tried to keep their romance out of the spotlight for the last few weeks, the two shocked their fans as they shared a kiss on the sidelines, a few weeks ago. Amid their newfound romance, the “All Day and Night” pop star opened up about what has been making her feel “overwhelmed”.A few weeks ago, the popular pop star, Madison Beer, opened up about how her relationship with her fans has changed over the last few years.Madison Beer spoke to The Paper magazine as she said, “I got off Twitter a couple months ago, which I'd never done since I started. It was negatively impacting my ability to see my artistic direction clearly…”The popular pop star added, “I really value their opinions, but when there are too many cooks in the kitchen, I get overwhelmed. I was second-guessing myself constantly…”Madison Beer continued, “Deleting Twitter has actually helped me feel more connected, not less. I do IG Lives on my mbhq account and it feels like the same old — we just talk, and it feels like family. Honestly, I feel closest to them on tour, but not reading the constant discourse has made my decisions for this project really my own.”Madison Beer’s newly released track, “yes baby”, has already broken records and it seems the 26 year old pop star is in one of the happiest phases of her life.The pop star has always been very public with her struggles regarding her mental health and how her career hit a pause when her record label fired her.Despite all that Madison Beer has been through, it seems the pop star has recovered from it and is fully focused on her new projects and being there for Justin Herbert.Madison Beer was also spotted walking the ramp at the recent Victoria’s Secret fashion show even though Justin Herbert was not in attendance.Also Read: "I felt the love dying": Cardi B opens up about heartbreak and pain as she gears up for parenthood with Stefon Diggs
Article Summary: Madison beer opens up about stepping back. The pop star has always been very public with her struggles regarding her mental health and how her career hit a pause when her record label fired her. Madison beer’s newly released track, “yes baby”, has already broken records and it seems the 26 year old pop star is in one of the happiest phases of her life.

Article Title: Will Michael Penix Jr. play against the San Francisco 49ers tonight? Latest injury update on the Atlanta Falcons' quarterback
Article Text:
All eyes are on Michael Penix Jr.(Image via Jeffrey Becker-Imagn Images)

Is the Atlanta Falcons’ star player, Michael Penix Jr., taking the field against the San Francisco 49ers tonight?



Michael Penix Jr.’s injury update as he gears up to face the San Francisco 49ers tonight



The Atlanta Falcons have had an average start to the season as the team has managed to win in only three out of the six matches played so far in the new season. The Atlanta Falcons have lost against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, the Carolina Panthers and the Minnesota Vikings so far. As the team gears up to face the San Francisco 49ers, all eyes are on their star player, Michael Penix Jr.Yes, the Atlanta Falcons’ quarterback, Michael Penix Jr., is all set to play against the San Francisco 49ers tonight at the Levi’s Stadium.At this point in time, the Atlanta Falcons’ injury report does not feature Michael Penix Jr. on it. But the team has officially ruled out rookies Jalon Walker and Billy Bowman Jr., who have both sustained brutal soft tissue injuries and are working on their recoveries.Michael Penix did suffer a few brutal injuries in the last few seasons, including two ACL tears in 2018 and 2020, and two shoulder injuries in 2019 and in 2021.However, the Atlanta Falcons’ star player has fully recovered from the brutal injuries and is fully focused on the new season.As the Atlanta Falcons won against the Buffalo Bills in their recent match, Michael Penix Jr.reflected on the team’s performance.He said, “Obviously, we had that one game that we didn't like, that Carolina game, not putting up any points on the board…”The Atlanta Falcons’ star player said, “But I knew that wasn't us, so I didn't soak into that and get in my feelings about that game, because I knew that wasn't us that day. I knew that wasn't me that day. As long as we continue to trust in each other and go out there and play for one another, we'll be fine.”The exciting match between the San Francisco 49ers and the Atlanta Falcons is all set to begin at 5:20 pm P.T. at Levi’s Stadium.Also Read: Will Brock Purdy play against the Atlanta Falcons today? Latest injury update on the San Francisco 49ers' quarterback
Article Summary: All eyes are on michael penix jr. as he gears up to face the san francisco 49ers tonight. The atlanta falcons have had an average start to the season as the team has managed to win in only three out of the six matches played so far in the new season.

Article Title: NBA trade rumors: Boston Celtics predicted to land $186 million Milwaukee Bucks superstar to form deadly duo with Jayson Tatum
Article Text:
Jayson Tatum and Jaylen Brown (Image via Getty)

Boston Celtics

Giannis Antetokounmpo

How Giannis Could Be a Potential Game-Changer for the Boston Celtics

Proposed Trade Breakdown

Team Receives Boston Celtics Giannis Antetokounmpo, Myles Turner, Bobby Portis



Milwaukee Bucks Jaylen Brown, Anfernee Simons, Sam Hauser, Xavier Tillman, 2 First-Round Picks





Giannis Antetokounmpo (Image via USA Today)

Why the Trade Could Make Sense

Key Impacts of the Trade

What It Means for Giannis Antetokounmpo and the Bucks

Thecould be on the verge of one of the biggest shake-ups in franchise history. With Jayson Tatum sidelined for most, if not all, of the 2025-26 NBA season due to a severe Achilles injury, the team might consider a bold move to keep their championship window alive - one that involves acquiring Milwaukee Bucks superstarTatum’s absence leaves a massive void, but Jaylen Brown is expected to carry the offensive load. Still, as reported by Fansided’s Matt Moore, Boston could benefit from thinking long-term by making a blockbuster trade with Milwaukee - one that would bring a generational player to TD Garden.According to Moore, the proposed trade would send Jaylen Brown, Anfernee Simons, Sam Hauser, Xavier Tillman, and two first-round picks to the Bucks. In return, the Boston Celtics would receive Giannis Antetokounmpo, Myles Turner, and Bobby Portis.Moore described the potential deal as painful but transformative for both sides. He wrote, “Obviously, Jaylen Brown is the best player in any of these packages that the Bucks can get back. A good-to-great player, in his prime, on a long-term contract. It would be painful for the Boston Celtics to make this trade… but Boston gets to instantly reorganize their future. It’s now Tatum coming back from the Achilles with Derrick White and Giannis.That’s your core for the next four years.” (H/t: Sporting News)The Boston Celtics’ current roster is talented, but losing Tatum for a long stretch threatens to stall their momentum. Adding Giannis Antetokounmpo, one of the league’s most dominant forwards, could immediately revitalize the team’s championship aspirations.Meanwhile, the Bucks would gain valuable depth and flexibility, particularly with Myles Turner anchoring their frontcourt and shifting their system from a wing-heavy to a more balanced inside-out structure.• For Boston: Forms a new core of Giannis, Tatum, and Derrick White, ensuring long-term competitiveness.• For Milwaukee: Gains multiple starting-caliber players and future assets to build around post-Giannis era.• For Giannis: Offers a fresh start with a championship-caliber franchise while pairing with a Top 15-20 player in Tatum once he returns. Giannis Antetokounmpo , who signed a massive $175 million contract, remains one of the NBA’s most valuable players. Yet, if Milwaukee’s postseason struggles continue, his patience could wear thin. A slow or uncompetitive start to the 2025-26 season might open the door for the Boston Celtics to swoop in.The 6-foot-11 forward has made it clear that he wants to maximize his prime years. If the Bucks fail to show signs of progress, a change of scenery might become inevitable. Boston’s combination of organizational stability and future star power could be exactly what he’s looking for.While the deal is purely hypothetical for now, it represents the kind of forward-thinking move that could redefine both franchises. Boston would get a generational talent ready to lead alongside Tatum once he’s healthy, while Milwaukee could reset with a deep, versatile roster.Also read: NBA trade rumors: Los Angeles Lakers Predicted to sign $186 million Milwaukee Bucks NBA All-Star to form deadly duo with Luka Doncic As the new season unfolds, all eyes will be on how Giannis Antetokounmpo and the Bucks perform early. An unconvincing start could make this blockbuster trade pitch more realistic than fans might think.
Article Summary: The milwaukee bucks could be on the verge of one of the biggest shake-ups in franchise history. With jayson tatum sidelined for most, if not all, of the 2025-26 nba season due to a severe achilles injury, the team might consider a bold move to keep their championship window alive.

Article Title: Miami Dolphins make bold QB move: Quinn Ewers steps up as Tua Tagovailoa’s backup for Week 7 vs Browns
Article Text:
Quinn Ewers steps up as Dolphins’ QB backup (Image via: Getty images)

Quinn Ewers confirmed as Dolphins ’ backup to Tua Tagovailoa for Week 7

Zach Wilson moved to third-string as Dolphins adjust QB depth chart





The Miami Dolphins are making a bold quarterback move ahead of their Week 7 clash against the Cleveland Browns. Tua Tagovailoa remains the starter, but rookie Quinn Ewers will now serve as his backup, replacing Zach Wilson. Miami is preparing for a challenging game in Cleveland’s windy, wet conditions while testing their quarterback depth.According to NFL Network insider Ian Rapoport, Quinn Ewers will be active as the backup to Tua Tagovailoa for the Dolphins’ matchup against the Browns. Zach Wilson has been moved to the third-string role. This marks Ewers’ first time active in an NFL game, highlighting Miami’s confidence in the rookie’s ability to step up under pressure. The move also gives Ewers a chance to make his NFL debut in a potentially high-stakes environment.Ewers, who played his final season at Texas, threw for 3,472 passing yards with 31 touchdowns and 12 interceptions, leading the SEC in touchdown passes. In the Dolphins’ preseason, he went 23-of-43 for 273 yards and two touchdowns, taking four sacks but committing no turnovers. These performances signal that Ewers is ready to contribute when called upon.Miami’s $6 million offseason signing, Zach Wilson, is now the third-string quarterback. This season, Wilson completed 29-of-45 passes for 327 yards, one touchdown, and seven sacks, avoiding turnovers. The Dolphins’ decision to prioritize Ewers reflects their focus on building depth and evaluating rookie talent for long-term success. Wilson’s demotion highlights Miami’s growing trust in rookie quarterback Quinn Ewers, who continues to draw attention as one of the most promising young passers in the AFC.With Tua Tagovailoa starting and Ewers as the backup, Miami is prepared for any scenario in Cleveland. The windy and wet conditions could make the quarterback position crucial if a substitution is required. This move also gives Ewers a chance to make an early NFL impact and shows Miami’s strategic approach to managing their quarterback room.The Dolphins’ Week 7 quarterback change demonstrates the team’s commitment to preparing for adversity and developing rookie talent. Quinn Ewers’ elevation to backup marks a significant step in his NFL journey and could play a key role in Miami’s Week 7 game against the Browns. If Ewers sees game action, it could offer a glimpse into Miami’s future at quarterback — a storyline that could define their 2025 NFL campaign.Also Read: Could Dolphins’ Anthony Weaver jump ship after 2025 disaster? Titans eye defensive coach for head job
Article Summary: Quinn ewers will be active as the dolphins’ backup to tua tagovailoa. Zach wilson has been moved to the third-string role. Miami is preparing for a challenging game in cleveland’s windy, wet conditions while testing their quarterback depth.

Article Title: Will Brock Purdy play against the Atlanta Falcons tonight? Latest injury update on the San Francisco 49ers' quarterback
Article Text:
Brock Purdy's injuries have raised eyebrows.(Image via Darren Yamashita-Imagn Images)

Is the San Francisco 49ers’ star player, Brock Purdy, taking the field against the Atlanta Falcons today?



Brock Purdy’s injury update and when he would be able to come back to the field as he recovers from his brutal injuries



The San Francisco 49ers have had a pretty strong start to the season as the team has managed to win four out of the six matches played so far in the new season. The San Francisco 49ers have managed to win against the Seattle Seahawks, the New Orleans Saints, the Arizona Cardinals and the Los Angeles Rams. As the team gears up to face the Atlanta Falcons, all eyes are on their star player, Brock Purdy.No, it seems the San Francisco 49ers’ popular quarterback, Brock Purdy, will not be facing the Atlanta Falcons today.A few hours ago, NFL insider Adam Schefter of ESPN took to X to post, “49ers ruled out QB Brock Purdy (toe) and WR Ricky Pearsall (knee) for Sunday night’s game against the Falcons. 49ers QB Mac Jones starts again.”While the San Francisco 49ers were looking to depend on Brock Purdy in the new season, the star player sustained brutal toe and shoulder injuries in the Week 1 match against the Seattle Seahawks.Brock Purdy did come back to face the Jacksonville Jaguars in Week 4 but was still injured as the San Francisco 49ers ended up losing that game.At this point in time, the San Francisco 49ers have not announced a timeline for when Brock Purdy will be able to return to the field.Brock Purdy was spotted practising in a limited fashion on Wednesday and Thursday but the team has not confirmed his return yet.However, as per reports, there is a chance that Brock Purdy will come back when the San Francisco 49ers will be facing the Houston Texans.With Brock Purdy gone, it has sparked panic among the team’s fans as the team gears up to face the Atlanta Falcons today.The exciting match between the San Francisco 49ers and the Atlanta Falcons is all set to begin at 5:20 pm P.T. at Levi’s Stadium.Also Read: "He sits in the driveway before entering home": Patrick Mahomes and Brittany Mahomes' resurfaced awkward moment sparks chaos among fans
Article Summary: Brock purdy sustained brutal toe and shoulder injuries in the week 1 match against the seattle seahawks. The san francisco 49ers have had a pretty strong start to the season as the team has managed to win four out of the six matches played so far in the new season. As the team gears up to face the atlanta falcons, all eyes are on their star player.

Article Title: Morgan Rielly’s early-season surge is exactly what the Toronto Maple Leafs needed after losing Mitch Marner
Article Text:
Photo by Mark Blinch/NHLI via Getty Images

How Morgan Rielly turned trade rumors into a breakout season with the Toronto Maple Leafs

Morgan Rielly’s return as power-play quarterback could define how the Toronto Maple Leafs adjust without Mitch Marner

When Mitch Marner left Toronto this offseason, the Maple Leafs faced legitimate concerns about how they’d replace one of their most reliable offensive engines. Through the opening six games of the 2025–26 campaign, those fears have been tempered by an unlikely source: defenseman Morgan Rielly. The veteran has responded to offseason trade rumors and a tough 2024–25 season by rediscovering his offensive spark, racking up six points while looking revitalized under Craig Berube’s system. With general manager Brad Treliving challenging him to lead, Rielly has embraced his role again as power-play quarterback, even as questions remain about the unit’s efficiency.Back in May, only days after Toronto was eliminated by the Florida Panthers in Game 7 of the second round, general manager Brad Treliving sat down with Rielly to review the year. According to those close to the team, the conversation was blunt but constructive: more was expected from the veteran. Morgan Rielly , who had posted just 41 points last season and was minus-three in that decisive playoff loss, could easily have been pushed aside. Instead, he arrived at training camp in the best shape of his career.“I thought (Morgan) had a really good game, skated well, moved the puck well, good reads, defended well, he was solid,” Berube said on October 9 at Scotiabank Arena after Rielly netted the game-winner against the Montreal Canadiens in the season opener. “(It) was great to see him have a good game.(There was) a lot of good, and there’s stuff that we’ve got to work on, but we did a good enough job to win the game. I thought our third period was our best period, (we did a) good job protecting the lead, closing it out.”That performance set the tone. Through six games, Rielly already has six points, tied for third among NHL defensemen behind only Cale Makar and Shayne Gostisbehere. He rediscovered his confidence to jump into the rush, scoring against Montreal and again in an overtime loss to the Seattle Kraken on October 18.One of the most notable changes for Rielly this season is his return to quarterbacking Toronto’s top power-play unit. Last year, Marner handled point duties in a five-forward setup. Now it’s back on Rielly’s shoulders. The early results have been uneven—just two goals in 14 opportunities, a 14.3 percent success rate that ranks tied for 24th in the league. Critics have long pointed out that he lacks a heavy shot from the point, but his vision and passing ability have historically compensated.The success of this man-advantage unit could ultimately determine whether Toronto maintains its scoring pace without Marner and finally breaks through for a deeper playoff run.For Rielly, this year is about more than numbers. It’s about reshaping his place in Toronto after whispers of a trade and doubts about his defensive reliability. His strong start suggests he heard the message from Treliving loud and clear and is ready to embrace the responsibility that comes with being the Leafs’ longest-serving player.“My goal was to leave no stone unturned,” Rielly said this summer when reflecting on his offseason preparation. If his first six games are any indication, that mentality could help turn the Maple Leafs into a more complete team, and perhaps finally give Toronto the kind of blue line stability it has lacked for years. If this resurgence holds, Rielly won’t just silence trade rumors, he could redefine what’s possible for Toronto without Marner.Also Read: Jalen Luypen joins South Carolina Stingrays after leaving Chicago Blackhawks system bringing pro experience and playoff pedigree
Article Summary: Morgan rielly is having a breakout season with the toronto maple leafs. The veteran has responded to offseason trade rumors and a tough 2024–25 season by rediscovering his offensive spark. He has six points, tied for third among nhl defensemen behind only cale makar and shayne gostisbehere.

Article Title: Wayne Gretzky vs Alex Ovechkin net worth in 2025: Who is richer, NHL career, endorsements, legacy and more
Article Text:
Wayne Gretzky vs Alex Ovechkin net worth in 2025: Who is richer, NHL career, endorsements, legacy and more (Image via Getty)

Wayne Gretzky net worth in 2025

Alex Ovechkin NHL career and salary earnings

Wayne Gretzky endorsements and legacy power

Alex Ovechkin record breaking moment and legacy

Final money comparison between Wayne Gretzky vs Alex Ovechkin in 2025

Wayne Gretzky and Alex Ovechkin are two of the most famous names in hockey history. In 2025, both are still at the center of NHL conversations. Gretzky is retired and known as the greatest overall player ever. Ovechkin is still active and is now the all-time goal leader. Fans often compare their money, careers, and legacy. This article looks at who is richer and how they built their success.Wayne Gretzky has a net worth of about 250 million dollars in 2025. He earned around 46 million dollars during his 20 year NHL career with teams like the Edmonton Oilers and Los Angeles Kings.Most of his money came after retirement. He made millions from business deals, NHL team ownership shares, wine businesses, and TV work. He also had big brand deals with Nike, Coca-Cola, and Upper Deck. He is still called The Great One.Alex Ovechkin has a net worth of about 80 million dollars in 2025. He is still playing for the Washington Capitals. Alex Ovechkin has earned more than 160 million dollars in NHL salary, which is the highest salary total in NHL history.He also makes money from big brands like Nike, Gatorade, Beats and CCM Hockey. In the 2025 to 2026 NHL season, he has already scored and is moving toward 900 career goals.Wayne Gretzky changed the NHL forever. He helped grow the sport in the United States. He still holds the record for most assists and points in NHL history.Even after retirement, brands still pay him to appear on TV and at events. He has been featured on ESPN and NHL broadcasts in 2025. His calm image and clean reputation make him a long term face of hockey even today.Alex Ovechkin made history in April 2025 when he broke Wayne Gretzky’s all-time NHL goals record with more than 895 goals. Gretzky himself congratulated him. Fans in Washington and around the world celebrated.Alex Ovechkin is known for his powerful shot, strong leadership, and high energy style. Many experts now call him the greatest goal scorer ever, while Gretzky is seen as the greatest all-around player in NHL history.Wayne Gretzky is still richer with 250 million dollars. Alex Ovechkin is at 80 million dollars but still earning. Gretzky made most of his money from business and brand deals.Also Read: From The Great One To The Great Family: How Wayne Gretzky And Janet Jones Built A Dynasty Beyond The Rink Alex Ovechkin is still building his wealth through NHL salary and endorsements. Both are legends, but Gretzky leads in money while Ovechkin leads in modern era records.
Article Summary: Wayne gretzky and alex ovechkin are two of the most famous names in hockey history. In 2025, both are still at the center of nhl conversations. Fans often compare their money, careers, and legacy. This article looks at who is richer and how they built their success.

Article Title: Bryce Young injury update: Panthers quarterback exits game vs. Jets after ankle scare
Article Text:
Bryce Young injury update: Panthers quarterback exits game vs. Jets after ankle scare (Image Via Getty)

Bryce Young’s injury and Panthers’ victory

Jacksonville Jaguars coach Liam Coen reflects after loss to Rams

Carolina Panthers quarterback Bryce Young was forced to leave Sunday’s game against the New York Jets after hurting his ankle late in the third quarter. The game was held at MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford, New Jersey, on October 19, 2025. Young had completed 15 of 25 passes for 138 yards and a touchdown when the injury happened. The top pick of the 2023 NFL Draft limped off the field after a sack by Jets linebacker Jowon Briggs. The Panthers were leading 13-3 at the time, and backup quarterback Andy Dalton stepped in to finish the game, helping Carolina secure a 13-6 win, their third straight victory for the first time since 2021.Bryce Young’s last play came when New York’s Jowon Briggs hit his ankle during a sack. Young immediately left the field and went to the locker room. He did not return for the rest of the game.Despite the injury, the Panthers managed to hold on to their lead. Andy Dalton came in and completed 4 of 7 passes for 60 yards. Carolina’s defense stayed strong, allowing only a late touchdown to the Jets.Panthers head coach Frank Reich praised Young’s toughness but confirmed that the team would monitor the injury closely over the next few days.The victory marked a positive note for the Panthers, who are showing consistency this season despite the quarterback setback.Also Read: Who Are Myles Garrett’s Parents? Everything To Know About Audrey And Lawrence Garrett Meanwhile, Jacksonville Jaguars head coach Liam Coen faced a difficult day after his team lost 35-7 to the Los Angeles Rams at Wembley Stadium in London on October 19, 2025. Coen admitted he needed to take responsibility for the team’s mistakes.“It’s definitely frustrating, but just like everybody else in there, you’ve got to look inward first,” Coen said. The Jaguars struggled early, committing 13 penalties for 119 yards and giving up a touchdown due to an illegal block by Jarrian Jones.Quarterback Trevor Lawrence completed 23 of 48 passes for 296 yards and one touchdown but acknowledged slow starts are an issue. Coen also noted that rookie Travis Hunter had a career-high performance with eight receptions for 101 yards and his first touchdown.The Jaguars will use the upcoming bye week to evaluate personnel and make potential lineup adjustments before facing the Las Vegas Raiders on November 2.
Article Summary: Carolina panthers quarterback bryce young was forced to leave sunday’s game against the new york jets after hurting his ankle late in the third quarter. The game was held at metlife stadium in east rutherford, new jersey, on october 19, 2025. Backup quarterback andy dalton stepped in to finish the game, helping carolina secure a 13-6 win.

Article Title: First ever Dh100 million jackpot winner crowned in UAE lottery’s historic draw
Article Text:
UAE Lottery’s first Dh100 million jackpot winner announced in historic October 18 draw/Representative Image

Historic jackpot win and draw details





Other prize winners and prize structure





Dh100,000 Prizes:

Ten players won Dh100,000 each. This includes seven winners of the Lucky Chance IDs, which guarantee a cash prize of Dh100,000 regardless of the draw outcome. The Lucky Chance ID winners for this draw were:



Ten players won Dh100,000 each. This includes seven winners of the Lucky Chance IDs, which guarantee a cash prize of Dh100,000 regardless of the draw outcome. The Lucky Chance ID winners for this draw were: CE5529701



BR4205618



AU1989749



DE8116103



AU1961863



CH5815807



BK3549063

Additionally, three players secured Dh100,000 by matching five numbers in the Days set plus the Month number in the draw.

Dh1,000 Prizes:

67 players won Dh1,000 each by matching either five days or four days plus the month number.

67 players won Dh1,000 each by matching either five days or four days plus the month number. Dh100 Prizes:

7,067 players claimed Dh100 each by matching various combinations such as three days plus the month, two days plus the month, one day plus the month, or only the month.

Background and regulations of the UAE lottery









A UAE resident has made history by becoming the first-ever jackpot winner of the UAE Lottery’s Dh100 million grand prize. This landmark event took place during the 23rd draw on Saturday, October 18, 2025, marking the biggest prize awarded since the lottery’s launch in late 2024. Alongside the jackpot winner, thousands of other players also walked away with substantial winnings.In an unprecedented moment for the UAE Lottery, one lucky resident matched all seven winning numbers in the latest draw, securing the Dh100 million grand prize. The jackpot required matching all six numbers from the Days set, in any order, plus an exact match of the Month number. The winning numbers for the draw were 25, 18, 29, 11, 7, and 10 in the Days set, with 11 in the Months set.The chances of hitting this jackpot are extremely slim, with odds standing at 1 in 8,835,372. The identity of the grand prize winner remains confidential as the UAE Lottery prepares for an official announcement.This was the 23rd draw since the UAE Lottery began operating. Launched in December 2024, it is the first and only government-regulated lottery in the UAE, managed by The Game LLC, an Abu Dhabi-based company licensed in July 2024.Draws take place every two weeks, giving residents a biweekly opportunity to win significant prizes.Saturday’s draw was not only notable for the jackpot but also for the large number of other winners across various prize tiers. The total number of winners in the 23rd draw reached 7,145 players.Tickets for the UAE Lottery cost Dh50 each, and all prizes are tax-free in the UAE. Large prizes are paid out within 30 days of validation and verification of the winner’s eligibility.The UAE Lottery was officially launched in November 2024 and is the first of its kind fully regulated by the UAE government through the General Commercial Gaming Regulatory Authority (GCGRA). It aims to offer a safe and regulated environment for lottery gaming within the country.Players must be residents of the UAE and at least 18 years old to participate. All prize money is held in segregated trust accounts until claims are verified. Since its inception, the lottery has gained widespread popularity, providing residents with a legitimate chance to win large prizes legally and securely.The 22nd draw, prior to this historic event, saw 5,564 winners in total, including 49 players who won Dh1,000 and 5,508 players who won Dh100.
Article Summary: Uae lottery’s first dh100 million jackpot winner announced in historic october 18 draw. The jackpot required matching all six numbers from the days set, in any order, plus an exact match of the month number. The identity of the grand prize winner remains confidential as the uae lottery prepares for an official announcement.

Article Title: Tears in dugout: Smriti Mandhana breaks down as India stare at World Cup exit
Article Text:
Smriti Mandhana (ICC Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Women's World Cup prediction: Greenstone Lobo explains which team has best chance to win

NEW DELHI: Four-time champions England booked their spot in the semi-finals of the Women’s World Cup after a nail-biting four-run win over hosts India in Indore on Sunday. England posted a competitive 288/8, anchored by Heather Knight’s classy century, and held their nerve in the field to defend it, despite their bowling, usually their strength, being slightly off-colour.India looked on course for victory, needing just 62 runs from the last 10 overs with seven wickets in hand. But the dismissal of Smriti Mandhana shifted the momentum. The elegant left-hander, who had been anchoring the chase, danced down the track to left-arm spinner Linsey Smith but failed to clear long-off. Soon after, Richa Ghosh and Deepti Sharma fell in quick succession, leaving the tail exposed. As the match slipped away, Mandhana struggled to control her tears, a poignant reminder of how close India had come.Deepti Sharma, after reaching her half-century, attempted a risky slog sweep against Sophie Ecclestone and was caught at deep mid-wicket, sealing England’s victory."We probably needed 300, but we did well to pull things back and I'm very happy. Didn't contribute much in the last couple of games, so it felt good to come up with a match-winning hundred," said Knight, whose 109 off 91 balls, laced with 15 fours and a six, powered England’s innings.England’s openers gave them a brisk start with 73 runs for the first wicket before Knight and captain Nat Sciver-Brunt stitched a 113-run stand to keep the scoreboard ticking. At one point, England seemed set to breach 300, but Knight’s run out during a second run triggered a slowdown. Deepti Sharma finished with four wickets, keeping India in the hunt.The defeat marked India’s third consecutive loss, leaving their next clash against New Zealand a virtual knockout. Both teams are on four points, and only a win in both remaining games, along with favourable results elsewhere, will keep India’s semi-final hopes alive."Not sure how we lost this game. We had it in the bag. We've worked so hard and when the last five overs slip away from you, it's heartbreaking. This is the third straight game we've lost after coming so close," lamented India captain Harmanpreet Kaur, reflecting the anguish felt by the team and particularly by Mandhana, whose heartbreak underlined how agonisingly close India came to victory.
Article Summary: England beat india by four runs to reach the women's world cup semi-finals. Heather knight scored 109 off 91 balls, laced with 15 fours and a six. Deepti sharma finished with four wickets, keeping india in the hunt.

Article Title: How India can still qualify for Women's World Cup semifinals after defeat to England - scenarios explained
Article Text:
Image credit: BCCI Women

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Women's World Cup prediction: Greenstone Lobo explains which team has best chance to win

SCENARIO 1 – WIN BOTH MATCHES:

India beat New Zealand and Bangladesh.

Result: India qualifies for the semifinals regardless of other results.

SCENARIO 2 – LOSE TO NEW ZEALAND:

India lose to New Zealand.

Then, India hope New Zealand lose their final match against England.

India must beat Bangladesh to advance.

SCENARIO 3 – WIN vs NEW ZEALAND, LOSE vs BANGLADESH:

India beat New Zealand but lose to Bangladesh.

New Zealand must defeat England in their final match.

The team with the better net run-rate (India or New Zealand) will progress to the semifinals.

NEW DELHI: India’s Women’s World Cup campaign is on a knife-edge after another agonising defeat. Chasing a target of 289 against England in Indore on Sunday, India fell just four runs short, marking their third consecutive loss in the tournament. With the win, England secured a semifinal berth alongside South Africa and Australia, leaving only one spot up for grabs. India currently sit fourth in the points table with four points from five matches (NRR +0.526), while their main competitor for the final semifinal place, New Zealand, also has four points but a lower net run-rate (-0.245).The defeat leaves India, co-hosts and pre-tournament favourites, teetering on the brink of elimination, with their semi-final hopes now resting on the outcomes of the remaining two group matches.India will next face New Zealand on Thursday, followed by their final group match against Bangladesh on October 26.A win in both games would guarantee a spot in the semifinals.If they lose to New Zealand, India will need the White Ferns to lose their last match against England and then beat Bangladesh to advance.There’s also a third scenario. If India beat New Zealand but lose to Bangladesh, and New Zealand defeat England, the team with the better net run-rate will progress.Against England, India looked on course for victory for much of the chase. Skipper Smriti Mandhana scored a commanding 88, while Harmanpreet Kaur contributed 70 and Deepti Sharma added 50.With India needing 56 runs off 54 balls and seven wickets in hand, the match seemed under control. However, England fought back brilliantly to clinch the win. Heather Knight’s classy 109 off 91 balls, in her 300th international appearance, had earlier anchored England’s total of 288/8, with Amy Jones contributing 56.India’s bowlers triggered a late collapse, but Linsey Smith and Sophie Ecclestone sealed England’s triumph in the final overs.“It’s a bad feeling when you have put so much hard work in but the last 5-6 overs didn’t go according to the plan,” Harmanpreet said after the match. “Smriti’s wicket was the turning point for us. It’s a heartbreaking moment. Credit to England. They didn’t lose hope, they kept bowling and getting wickets.”
Article Summary: India's world cup campaign is on a knife-edge after another agonising defeat. Chasing a target of 289 against england in indore, india fell just four runs short. India currently sit fourth in the points table with four points from five matches.

Article Title: 'Do you have MS Dhoni's?': R Ashwin exposes fake Adam Zampa, reveals chat
Article Text:
R Ashwin and MS Dhoni (BCCI Photo)

Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma, R Ashwin, Cheteshwar Pujara retire... who next?

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

NEW DELHI: Indian spinner Ravichandran Ashwin recently found himself in a humorous situation when a person impersonating Australian cricketer Adam Zampa contacted him on WhatsApp, asking for the phone numbers of several Indian players.Ashwin shared screenshots of the conversation on Instagram, captioning it “Fake Adam Zampa tries to strike.” The post quickly went viral, with fans loving Ashwin’s sharp and witty replies to the impersonator.The fake Zampa asked Ashwin for the contact details of players such as Abhishek Sharma, Jasprit Bumrah, Sanju Samson, Jitesh Sharma, Rinku Singh, and Shivam Dube. Ashwin decided to play along, joking that he would send the list and asking if those names were enough.He then turned the tables by asking the impersonator if he had MS Dhoni’s number. When the fake Zampa replied that he did, Ashwin requested the number in return. The chat ended on a hilarious note, with Ashwin quipping that he was “Compiling in Excel” when the impersonator again pressed for the contacts.This wasn’t Ashwin’s first brush with online impostors. He revealed a similar incident involving someone pretending to be his former Chennai Super Kings teammate Devon Conway."After the IPL got over, one guy messaged me, claiming to be Devon Conway, 'Hi buddy, how are you?' and I also responded, 'We'll stay in touch. You're playing in MLC; I'll watch the games.' He then asked, 'I've lost Virat Kohli's number, can you share it?' I thought, why is he asking for Virat's number? I thought I should ask him, but I didn't want Devon Conway to misunderstand. Then I picked up Virat Kohli's card and gave him a different number," Ashwin shared on his YouTube channel.In a separate development, Ashwin recently defended pacer Harshit Rana after earlier questioning his inclusion in India’s ODI squad against Australia."I have always reiterated that no player should be attacked below the belt. When the attack becomes too personal, the genre changes. I would like to talk about Sanjay Manjrekar, who has criticised me throughout my career. But I have never held any grudge against him. What they say might be right or wrong, as long as the criticism doesn't get personal, I am fine with it," Ashwin stated on his YouTube channel.Ashwin also voiced his concern over the psychological toll of harsh social media criticism on young players."Assume Harshit sees the reel in which he is being harshly criticised, and he is about to play a match for India, wouldn't he be shattered by this? And if his parents and friends see it, what will be their mindset? We can definitely criticise their skill, their style of cricket and the trade that they are plying. But it shouldn't get personal. It may be funny once or twice, but it shouldn't be a running theme. The reason they are doing this is that there is an audience for it. Negativity sells these days. They sell whatever is in demand. We should avoid consuming such content," he added.
Article Summary: Ravichandran ashwin was contacted on whatsapp by a person pretending to be adam zampa. The fake zampa asked ashwin for the contact details of several indian players. Ashwin decided to play along, joking that he would send the list. He then turned the tables by asking the impersonator if he had ms dhoni's number.

Article Title: 'Harshit Rana is the Haris Rauf of India': Indian cricketer trolled hilariously after defeat to Australia
Article Text:
Harshit Rana of India (Photo by Paul Kane/Getty Images)

'Unfair at this stage!': Virat Kohli's childhood coach on the treatment of senior duo Virat-Rohit

India face mounting pressure following their disappointing loss in the first ODI against Australia at Perth's Optus Stadium. The match, which was initially anticipated as a celebratory return for Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli, resulted in India conceding a 1-0 series lead.Australia won the toss and elected to field first. The Indian batting lineup struggled to cope with the challenging conditions in a rain-affected match.India managed to score 136/9 in their allocated 26 overs, with the target being adjusted to 131 for Australia through DRS. Both Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli had brief stays at the crease, scoring 8 off 14 balls and 0 off 6 balls respectively.In the bowling department, Arshdeep Singh provided an early breakthrough by dismissing Travis Head. However, the Australian team comfortably achieved the target with seven wickets in hand and 29 balls remaining.The entire Indian bowling attack appeared ineffective, with Harshit Rana receiving particularly harsh criticism from fans. His selection for the series has been a topic of debate, with some suggesting his inclusion was influenced by his association with coach Gautam Gambhir Rana's performance in his four-over spell yielded no wickets while conceding 27 runs.This outcome has intensified the scrutiny surrounding his selection and capabilities at the international level.The Indian team now needs to regroup quickly as they prepare for the second match of the three-game series. The upcoming game is scheduled for October 23rd in Adelaide.The pressure will be particularly intense for Harshit Rana, who needs to prove his worth at the international level. A loss in the next match would put India in a difficult position to salvage the series.The match has highlighted concerns about team selection and performance under pressure. The Indian team's ability to bounce back will be tested in the upcoming Adelaide fixture.The rain-interrupted nature of the first match added to the complexity of the game, but the overall performance has raised questions about the team's adaptability in challenging conditions.India's batting collapse in the shortened format and the inability of their bowling unit to defend even a modest target has become a point of concern for the team management.The return of senior players Rohit and Kohli was expected to strengthen the team, but their early dismissals contributed to India's struggles in the match.The upcoming match in Adelaide presents an opportunity for the team to address these issues and level the series. The focus will be on both individual and collective improvement.Australia's commanding performance in chasing down the target has put additional pressure on India to respond strongly in the second ODI.The loss has sparked discussions about team selection strategies and the balance between giving opportunities to new players while maintaining team performance at the international level.The team management faces the challenge of making necessary adjustments while maintaining confidence in their selected players ahead of the crucial second match.
Article Summary: India conceded a 1-0 series lead to australia in the three-match odi series. The indian batting lineup struggled to cope with the challenging conditions in a rain-affected match. Harshit rana's performance in his four-over spell yielded no wickets while conceding 27 runs.

Article Title: “She doesn’t need my money”: Christian McCaffrey’s fierce defense of Olivia Culpo shows their love is built on respect
Article Text:
Former Miss Universe Olivia Culpo and San Francisco Forty-Niners star Christian McCaffrey have welcomed their first child. Daughter Colette Annalise was born in July 2025. Their journey began with social media interactions in 2019. They married in Rhode Island in June 2024. This new parenthood marks a significant milestone for the couple.

From social media sparks to a fairytale wedding in Rhode Island

A new chapter of love, faith, and family

Former Miss Universe Olivia Culpo and San Francisco 49ers star Christian McCaffrey have officially entered a new chapter of their picture-perfect love story, becoming parents. The couple, who welcomed their first child, daughter Colette Annalise, in July 2025, are celebrating a milestone that feels years in the making for fans who have followed their journey from flirtatious Instagram likes to walking down the aisle.Their romance began in 2019, when McCaffrey liked one of Culpo’s Instagram posts, a simple gesture that fans now see as the start of something special. Just months later, the two were spotted vacationing in Mexico, confirming the rumors that a new power couple was emerging. By the end of the year, Culpo proudly wore McCaffrey’s jersey at a Panthers game, and soon after, they made their relationship Instagram official.Over the years, the model and the athlete became one another’s biggest supporters, Culpo cheering from the sidelines and McCaffrey publicly defending her from online criticism.The NFL star once wrote, “She doesn’t need my money bubbs,” after a rude comment surfaced, reminding fans that his admiration for her goes beyond fame.Their shared milestones, including McCaffrey’s trade to the 49ers in 2022 and Culpo’s continued modeling success, only strengthened their bond.Their June 2024 wedding in Rhode Island was nothing short of a modern fairytale. Culpo told Vogue her goal was simplicity and grace: “I didn’t want it to exude sex in any way, shape, or form. I wanted it to feel effortless and as if it’s complimenting me, not overpowering me.”Just months after their wedding, Culpo revealed her pregnancy in March 2025 with the heartfelt caption, “next chapter, motherhood 🤍.” Now, with baby Colette’s arrival, the couple’s once-glamorous love story has transformed into a beautiful family narrative.Culpo later reflected on the experience, calling motherhood “the scariest and most rewarding of all experiences.” For two people who built their relationship on faith, loyalty, and admiration, their growing family marks the ultimate touchdown, one filled with love, humility, and the promise of a lifetime together.Also Read: “Never fails to blow me away”: Travis Kelce is all praises for Patrick Mahomes’ relentless drive as Chiefs reclaim their dominance
Article Summary: Former miss universe olivia culpo and san francisco forty-niners star christian mccaffrey have welcomed their first child. Daughter colette annalise was born in july 2025. Their journey began with social media interactions in 2019. They married in rhode island in june 2024.

Article Title: “Never fails to blow me away”: Travis Kelce is all praises for Patrick Mahomes’ relentless drive as Chiefs reclaim their dominance
Article Text:
Travis Kelce highlighted Patrick Mahomes' unwavering commitment to improvement as the driving force behind the Kansas City Chiefs' enduring success. Mahomes' consistent pursuit of excellence sets the tone for the entire team, fostering a culture where complacency is nonexistent and continuous growth is prioritized, even after multiple Super Bowl victories.

Travis Kelce says Patrick Mahomes’ hunger for improvement sets the tone for everyone

Patrick Mahomes’ leadership continues to inspire a championship mentality

Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce once again showed why his bond with Patrick Mahomes is one of the strongest in NFL history, not just on the field, but in the locker room as well. Following the Chiefs’ dominant 31–0 win over the Raiders, Kelce opened up about Mahomes’ mindset and leadership, giving fans a glimpse into what keeps Kansas City’s dynasty alive.Despite the Chiefs facing early-season struggles and public doubts about their offensive chemistry, Kelce made it clear that Mahomes’ work ethic has never wavered. “He’s just always gonna do what he can to get better,” Kelce said, reflecting on his quarterback’s consistent pursuit of excellence.The two-time MVP’s preparation and drive have defined the team’s culture under Andy Reid, creating an atmosphere where complacency simply doesn’t exist. “That’s why I love playing with him,” Kelce added. “That’s why this team is gonna get better throughout the year, because we all have that mentality.”Even after multiple Super Bowl titles, the Chiefs’ leaders continue to emphasize growth over glory. Mahomes’ commitment has turned improvement into a habit, one that teammates mirror in every practice and game.Kelce emphasized that Mahomes’ example sets the “tempo” for the entire roster.“Coach challenges us,” he said. “It’s one of those things... you see Pat doing it and it sets the tempo. It never fails to blow me away how good that guy can be.”That tempo has once again become Kansas City’s signature weapon. After being labeled as “in crisis” just weeks ago, the Chiefs have silenced critics with renewed focus and energy. Kelce’s words highlight a simple truth, Mahomes’ leadership isn’t just about his arm; it’s about his impact.As the Chiefs look to defend their dominance in a stacked AFC, their secret weapon remains the same: an unbreakable partnership between two players who demand greatness from each other and deliver it every time.Also Read: “This boy has my whole heart”: Brittany Mahomes gushes over Patrick as she reveals how their love survived fame and NFL glory
Article Summary: Travis kelce says patrick mahomes' hunger for improvement sets the tone for everyone on the team. Mahomes’ commitment has turned improvement into a habit, one that teammates mirror in every practice and game. After being labeled as “in crisis” just weeks ago, the chiefs have silenced critics with renewed focus.

Article Title: Shane Beamer speaks out amid Virginia Tech rumors while vowing to refocus South Carolina for a comeback
Article Text:
Shane Beamer (Image credits: IG/X)

Shane Beamer dismisses Virginia Tech rumors and tells players he’s fully committed to South Carolina

South Carolina’s struggles only reinforce Beamer’s determination to fix the program

Virginia Tech legacy makes headlines, but Beamer’s future remains firmly in Columbia

Amid a turbulent start to the season and swirling speculation linking him to Virginia Tech, South Carolina coach Shane Beamer made it clear on Sunday that his focus is entirely on his team. With the Gamecocks struggling in the SEC, Beamer reassured both players and fans that his commitment to Columbia has not wavered, and his energy is dedicated to turning around a disappointing start.Beamer addressed a CBS Sports report claiming multiple members of Virginia Tech’s search committee were advocating for his return. The 48-year-old coach, who played at Virginia Tech and later served as an assistant under his father, Hall of Famer Frank Beamer, said the report had no basis and his loyalty lies firmly with South Carolina.“I have no idea where that story came from,” Beamer said during his Sunday teleconference. “I have conveyed publicly many times how much I want to be here. This is my dream job. I said that when I came here, nothing has changed. I am pissed off at the way we are performing right now, and it's not acceptable. I came here to win a championship, and right now we're not getting it done, and my focus right now is on getting it fixed. ... We're in a storm right now that I’m going to get us out of.”He told his team personally that any notion of him seeking a “parachute” or soft landing elsewhere was false, emphasizing that all his attention is on improving the team’s performance.Saturday’s 26-7 loss to No. 14 Oklahoma dropped the Gamecocks to 3-4 overall and 1-4 in SEC play, highlighting a rough patch after a 9-4 season last year. Despite the challenges, Beamer insists that this is a moment to double down on accountability and rebuild the team’s culture.“When you’re 3-4, there’s all kinds of noise and chatter and speculation out there about all kinds of things,” Beamer said. “I wanted to make sure our players understood that I’m not focused on anything but getting this right. And that I’m gonna get it right.”Beamer’s connections to Virginia Tech are deep — he played there from 1995-99 and was an assistant under his father from 2011-15. Frank Beamer, South Carolina’s coaching legend, built the Hokies into a national powerhouse. Yet Shane’s commitment to South Carolina is reinforced by a contract through 2030 that pays $8.15 million this season, with a $5 million buyout if he departs early.While speculation may continue, Beamer’s message is clear: his energy, focus, and loyalty remain with the Gamecocks as he works to turn around a difficult season.Also read: Aryna Sabalenka and boyfriend Georgios Frangulis’ relationship timeline: A complete look at their romance, support, and viral moments so far
Article Summary: South carolina coach shane beamer dismissed speculation linking him to virginia tech. Beamer told his team that any notion of him seeking a “parachute” or soft landing elsewhere was false. The gamecocks are 3-4 and 1-4 in the sec after a disappointing start.

Article Title: Brock Purdy injury update: How long will the 49ers quarterback be sidelined with his toe injury?
Article Text:
Brock Purdy injury update (AP Photos)

Brock Purdy injury update : What it means for the 49ers



49ers’ Season outlook hinges on Brock Purdy’s recovery



San Francisco 49ers fans are holding their breath as Brock Purdy’s lingering turf toe injury drags on, threatening to derail the team’s early-season momentum. What was first seen as a minor setback in Week 1 against the Seahawks has snowballed into a prolonged absence, leaving the 49ers leaning on backup Mac Jones. Every update seems to bring more uncertainty, and with playoff hopes on the line, the pressure is mounting both on Purdy and the team.Purdy suffered the injury in the season opener against the Seattle Seahawks and briefly returned in Week 4 against the Jacksonville Jaguars, only to aggravate the toe. NBC reporter Melissa Stark shared that Purdy described the injury as “so annoying” and cautioned that “any movement in the wrong direction could set him back.” The quarterback is dealing with a hyperextension of his right big toe, which tore stabilizing ligaments under the joint—a serious injury that limits planting and pushing off, vital movements for any quarterback.Despite optimism for a potential Week 8 return against the Houston Texans, Purdy himself stressed that he remains “truly day-to-day.” The cautious approach is understandable, given the severity of turf toe and the risk of further setbacks if he returns too soon.Meanwhile, Mac Jones has guided the 49ers to a 3-1 record in his first five starts, proving capable but still unable to replicate the full impact of Purdy’s presence on the field.Purdy’s absence couldn’t come at a worse time. After signing a five-year, $265 million extension, he is the cornerstone of San Francisco’s offense, and the team’s strategy revolves around his return. With key players like Nick Bosa and Fred Warner sidelined for the season, and multiple injuries across the wide receiver corps, the 49ers are navigating a challenging roster landscape.San Francisco’s medical staff is prioritizing long-term health over rushing Purdy back, hoping that a full recovery will allow him to return stronger for the second half of the season. The team remains atop the NFC West at 4-2, but their ceiling is undeniably higher with Purdy at quarterback. Fans can only wait and hope that the star signal-caller returns at full strength, ready to steer the 49ers deep into the playoffs.Also Read: Who Are Kirk Cousins’ Parents? Meet Mary Ann and Don and discover how they shaped his life
Article Summary: Brock purdy's turf toe injury threatens to derail the 49ers' early-season momentum. The quarterback is dealing with a hyperextension of his right big toe, which tore stabilizing ligaments under the joint. The 49ers medical staff is prioritizing long-term health over rushing purdy back, hoping that a full recovery will allow him to return stronger.

Article Title: Virat Kohli steps aside, pushes Shubman Gill and Shreyas Iyer to walk first - WATCH
Article Text:
Virat Kohli (Getty Images)

'Unfair at this stage!': Virat Kohli's childhood coach on the treatment of senior duo Virat-Rohit

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

NEW DELHI: A lot of anticipation surrounded the first ODI in Perth, which India lost by seven wickets (DLS), as two of the game’s stalwarts, Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma, returned to the side after months. Both players had already retired from T20Is and Tests, making their comeback in the highly anticipated series opener against Australia at Optus Stadium even more significant.For Kohli, it marked his first ODI appearance since lifting the Champions Trophy on March 9 in Dubai.Virat was in a jovial mood from the start, interacting with teammates, sharing laughs, and cracking jokes.Ahead of the match, during the national anthem, he stopped and asked captain Shubman Gill and vice-captain Shreyas Iyer to lead the team and stand first in the line.However, Kohli’s return ended in disappointing fashion, as he was dismissed for a duck.Watch the video here Australia’s spin-bowling all-rounder Cooper Connolly dived to his left to complete the catch at point. Mitchell Starc thus became the second bowler to dismiss Kohli for a duck twice across all internationals, after James Anderson.Before Kohli’s exit, Rohit Sharma’s eagerly awaited comeback was short-lived. Making his 500th international appearance for India, Rohit was dismissed for eight runs by Josh Hazlewood after edging the ball to second slip, where debutant Matthew Renshaw took the catch.India now turn their attention to the second ODI against Australia, scheduled for Thursday at Adelaide Oval, Adelaide, hoping to bounce back and level the series after a tough start in Perth.
Article Summary: India lost the first odi against australia by seven wickets in perth. Virat kohli and rohit sharma returned to the side after months. Both players had already retired from t20is and tests. Kohli's return ended in disappointing fashion, as he was dismissed for a duck. The second odi is scheduled for thursday at adelaide oval.

Article Title: Shubman Gill joins legendary list, follows MS Dhoni and Virat Kohli into Indian cricket’s elite club
Article Text:
Shubman Gill of India (Photo by Paul Kane/Getty Images)

Captains to Lead India in all Formats

'A narrative is run outside, but... ': Shubman Gill opens up on alleged tension with Rohit Sharma

India

Australia

For the first time in nearly a decade, both Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli will take the field for India under a different captain. The last time that happened was back in 2016, when MS Dhoni was still leading the side. Now, it is Shubman Gill ’s turn to take charge, becoming India’s 28th ODI captain and the seventh to lead the country across all formats.2006- Virender Sehwag2008 -MS Dhoni2017 - Virat Kohli2017 - Ajinkya Rahane2022 - Rohit Sharma2022 -KL Rahul2025 - Shubman Gill*At just 26, Gill stands at the beginning of a fresh chapter in Indian cricket. The torch has been passed, quietly but significantly, from the two most influential batters of the last generation to one of the brightest stars of the next.Squad: Rohit Sharma, Shubman Gill(c), Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, Yashasvi Jaiswal, KL Rahul(w), Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Harshit Rana, Arshdeep Singh, Mohammed Siraj, Washington Sundar, Nitish Kumar Reddy, Dhruv Jurel, Prasidh KrishnaSquad: Travis Head, Mitchell Marsh(c), Marnus Labuschagne, Matthew Short, Matt Renshaw, Mitchell Owen, Josh Philippe(w), Cooper Connolly, Mitchell Starc, Xavier Bartlett, Josh Hazlewood, Ben Dwarshuis, Nathan Ellis, Matthew KuhnemannIndia’s new era begins in Perth on Sunday against Australia. The Optus Stadium is expected to host a near-capacity crowd, and the occasion feels bigger than a regular bilateral series. The focus may still rest on the two stalwarts, but this is undeniably Shubman Gill’s moment — the day he steps from promise into leadership, carrying the hopes of Indian cricket’s next generation.
Article Summary: Shubman gill becomes india’s 28th odi captain and the seventh to lead the country across all formats. At just 26, gill stands at the beginning of a fresh chapter in indian cricket. The torch has been passed, quietly but significantly, from the two most influential batters of the last generation to one of the brightest stars of the next.
